name: Summon Shadow Wolf
active: Summons 4 Shadow wolves with 1 HP and 3 attack
Cooldown: 30

name: Critical Strike
passive: 15% Chance to deal 1.5x attack damage

name: Wrath of Nature
active: Increases attack speed by 100%
Decreases movement speed by 50%
Cooldown: 40

name: Shackle of Nature
active: Entangles target for 1 second, dealing 200 magic damage
Cooldown: 10

name: Harden Shell
active: After .75 seconds of casting, hardens shell to return 100% of pure damage dealt while decreasing movement speed by 50% for 9 seconds
Cooldown: 60

name: Sea Wave
active: After 1.5 seconds of casting, summons a wave that deals 1000 magic damage to all in its path
Cooldown: 45

name: Hold
active: Pulls nearby target toward you and noms the target nine times, regaining 500 HP and dealing 300 magic damage per nom
Cooldown: 40

name: Slimy Ball
active: Spits on a target, making them slide forward for 6 seconds
If they collide with any object, they will be dealt 25% HP damage
Cooldown: 60

name: Slippery Skin
active: On hit, cast a wave toward enemy that deals 500 magic damage for 5 seconds
Cooldown: 20

name: Headbutt
active: Dashes toward and knocks back target
Deals 250 magic damage
Cooldown: 5

name: Heal
active: Spends 10 mana to heal 400 HP
Cooldown: 1

name: Massive Tusk
passive: Deals 100% auto attack damage to all enemies nearby (500 range)

name: Charge
active: Dashes a clone forward and knocks back all enemies in path
Deals 1500 magic damage
Cooldown: 40

name: Hailstorm
active: Channels a blizzard for 5 seconds, which each shard dealing 300 magic damage
Each shard have a random chance to summon a snowman
Cooldown: 75

name: Enrage
active: Jumps into the air, after 2 seconds, land and deal 3000 magic damage to all surrounding enemies
Cooldown: 20

name: Throw
active: Throws a tree covered in monke poo at target
Deals 500 magic damage and interrupts target
Cooldown: 4

name: Dark Strength
passive: On attack, 15% chance to deal 1.5x attack damage

name: Death Finger
active: Throws a death coil at a target and stuns for 3 seconds
Deals 1250 magic damage
Cooldown: 60

name: Summon Wraith
active: Summons 4 Wraiths for 60 seconds
Cooldown: 90

name: Craze
active: Decreases movement speed by 50% to increase attack speed by 200%
Attacks drag targets toward self
Lasts 8 seconds
Cooldown: 60

name: Bloody Echoes
active: Summons 2 Soldiers of Blood at target location, dealing 750 magic damage
Cooldown: 30

name: Blood Anger
active: Summons six blood lines that spread in a hexagonal pattern around self
After reaching max distance, move 30 degrees counter-clockwise around target and return
Deals 75% max HP to all those in path
Coodlown: 60

name: True Requiem
active: After 3 seconds of channeling, deals 3000 magic damage to nearby enemies (900 range)
Cooldown: 120

name: Ghostly Strike
passive: On attack, 25% chance to stun for .3 seconds and deal 1000 magic damage

name: Death Cross
active: Summon 4 waves that will travel either cardinal OR diagonal directions that kills all in its path
Cooldown: 30

name: Summon Bat Statue
active: Summons a bat statue that will heal caster 2000 HP per second
Cooldown: 40

name: Hear me out!
passive: On hit, the caster reflects 100% damage
Cooldown: 30

name: Desperate Flight
trigger: After reaching below 50% HP, teleport to a random area in area 7
After teleporting, heal self by 1000 HP every second
Spells will do the opposite of what the caster says below 50%

name: Slaves of Trueflame
active: Summons 4 Lava elementals to fight for Ragnaar
Lasts 60 seconds
Cooldown: 90

name: Craze
active: Increase movement speed by 50% and attack speed by 100% for 20 seconds
Cooldown: 90

name: Hellflame Nova
active: After channeling for 3 seconds, creates pillars of fire around Ragnaar dealing 3000 magic damage
Cooldown: 80

name: Fireball Barrage
passive: Throws 3-5 fireballs every second around self, dealing 300 magic damage

name: Evil Power
passive: While in combat, gain 250 attack damage and increase health by 1000 per second 20 times

name: Seal
active: Silences target for 1 second
Cooldown: 5

name: Nyohoho
active: Increases attack speed by 100% for 4 seconds
Moves opposite of attacker on hit
Cooldown: 20

name: How fun!
trigger: Upon reaching 66% and 33% HP, summon a barrage of fireballs that insta-kill any enemy that touches them moving clockwise starting at 3'o'clock

name: Water Bolt
passive: Reduces movement speed by 25%

name: Water Shield
passive: Uses all mana to block next attack
Cooldown: 3

name: Tentacle Spike
active: Summons a spike from above the target and mini-stuns them, dealing 1000 magic damage
Cooldown: 4

name: Tentacle Slam
active: Slams the ground, after a second, tentacles spike up, insta-killing everyone it the vicinity
Can either surround caster or be 300 range around caster
Each cast recharges 1 mana
On max mana, Tentacle slam will fill both inner and outer layer
Cooldown: 30

name: Tentacles
active: Silences target and deals 500 physical damage per second for 3 seconds

name: Sea Beam
active: Hits a target for 500 magic damage and jumps to 3 nearby enemies, dealing 100% damage
Cooldown: 3

name: Water Splash
active: After one second channel, knockback all nearby enemies by 1000 range, dealing 1000 magic damage
Cooldown: 15

name: Summon Bubble
active: Spawns two bubbles randomly around the caster
If stepped on or after 15 seconds, deals 2500 magic damage to all enemies in a cross
Cooldown: 10

name: The Sea will Shallow You!
trigger: Upon reaching 50%, become invulnerable and transforms into a beam of water that will circle the nearest enemy in a counter - clockwise pattern, charging at you every 5 seconds for 15 seconds
After this, he will have 0 mana and cannot cast this again until full mana is reached

name: Unstoppable Force
active: Targets a place to run to (in the direction of a hero) and with full dedication rushes towards it
Any heroes in its path will immediately die
Cooldown: 60

name: Crushing Slam
active: Slams the ground causing a shockwave in the nearby area, dealing 25% max hp damage
Any heroes caught in it will be stunned for 2 seconds
Cooldown: 80

name: Evasive Movement
active: Dodges any attack for 1 second, increases movement speed to full
Cooldown: 10

name: Dark Blast
active: Knocks enemies away and deals 1000 magic damage
Cooldown: 30

name: Faerie Fire
active: Decreases enemy armor by 25
Cooldown: 1

name: Thorns Aura
passive: On hit, returns 5% damage to sender and gives self +250 armor

name: Mana Swipe
passive: Deals 100% attack damage to all nearby enemies

name: Slow Blast
active: Targets beneath a hero's feet and creates an enclosing whirlpool of mana
Heroes caught will take 4000 magic damage and their movement speed reduced for 5 seconds
Cooldown: 10

name: Mana Explosion
active: Creates a vacuum beneath itself, sucking in any nearby heroes and finally exploding after a few seconds.
Can only be used once it reaches full mana
Cooldown: 60

name: Lethal Poison
boss: Ruler of the Lav Sea Hydra
passive: On auto-attack, applies a debuff that will deal 450 magic damage per second for 5 seconds

name: Stomp
boss: Ruler of the Lav Sea Hydra
active: After 3 seconds of casting, deals 2500 magic damage to all enemies nearby and stun them for 2 seconds in 400 AoE.

name: Sea Wave
boss: Ruler of the Lav Sea Hydra
active: After 1.5 seconds of casting, sends a wave that will deal 1500 magic damage to all enemies in its path

name: Pumpkin Body
passive: On auto-attack, 15% chance to deal 1.5x attack damage.

name: Jack Impact
active: After 2.75 seconds of casting, blasts the surrounding area (1000 AoE) with a nova
Deals 6000 damage to any nearby heroes

name: Jack Wave
active: After 1.75 seconds of casting, shoots a ball of mana in a straight line
Deals 2500 damage to any heroes in the path

name: Hound of Berskubil
active: After 1 second of casting, releases his hound to attack the heroes
Attacks in a single line, dealing 2000 damage to each hero in the path

name: Death Bind
active: Grabs a targetted hero and pulls them towards himself, stunning them for .2 seconds
Deals 1000 damage

name: Immortal Body
passive: On auto-attack, 15% chance to deal 1.5x attack damage.

name: Requiem of Blood
active: After 3 seconds of casting, blasts the area around him with a nova of blood (1000 range)
Deals 7500 magic damage to all enemies in the nova and stuns them for .1 second

name: Unleash: True Form
active: Assumes his true form and gains 75% attack speed, 3000 extra damage
Also deals -1000 damage per second to all enemies nearby (400 range)
Lasts until mana runs out

name: Magical Weapon
passive: On Auto-attack, 15% to cause lightning or frost to hit the target
Lighting deals 1500 damage and frost deals 500 damage

name: Dark Star
active: After 3.5 seconds of casting, summons a dark star that deals 10000 damage to all nearby enemies (900 range)

name: Blizzard
active: After 1 second of casting, channels a Blizzard at Target Area
Blizzard lasts for 10 waves with 12 shards that deal 1000 damage each
Maximum of 5000 damage can be taken per wave

name: Chain Lightning
active: Shoots lightning at a nearby target, dealing 1000 magic damage to all enemies nearby target

name: Dragon Fear
active: After .5 seconds of preparing, the dragon's howl causes fear in the hearts of the any nearby (1000 range)
Enemies are dealt 1000 magic damage
Heroes affected by it will have 30% attack speed reduction and 10% movement speed reduction for 5 seconds

name: Hell Flame
active: After 3 sconds of channeling, blasts fire all around him (1000 range)
Deals 5000 damage to nearby heroes and interrupts them

name: Dragon Breath
active: After 3 seconds of channeling, blasts a beam of fire from his mouth in a straight line
Deals 7500 damage to heroes in its path

name: Dragon's Might
active: Takes flight and replaces its auto-attack with an AoE attack that deals 3000 AoE

name: Nanoscale Armor
passive: On auto-attack, 10% chance to deal 3x attack damage

name: Genocide Sword
active: After 3 seconds of channeling, blasts the area in holy light dealing 7500 to all enemies within 600 range

name: Blessed Wings
passive: On attack, 15% chance to deal 1.75x attack damage

name: Sacred Conviction
active: After 3 seconds of channeling, sends a wave of light where it's facing, dealing 6000 damage to enemies in its path

name: Holy Grab
active: Pulls target toward them at holy speeds, dealing 2000 damage to target and interrupting them

name: Sacred Judgment
active: After 3 seconds of calling the Archangel's might, sends it down onto the area (1000 range) dealing 15000 damage

name: Judgment of Darkness
active: After channeling for 3 seconds, deals 15000 damage to all enemies nearby (1200 range) and interrupts them

name: Craze
active: Gives 400% attack speed for 15 seconds

name: Dark Wings
active: On auto-attack, 15% chance to deal 1.75x damage

name: Hell Finger
active: Pulls a target toward caster, dealing 3000 damage and interrupts them

name: Darkness Wave
active: After two seconds of casting, the caster will send a wave of darkness toward the target area
The wave will deal 3000 damage

name: Spirit Breath
passive: On death, grow in size for one second and deal 2500 magic damage to all nearby enemies

name: Hellfrost Nova
active: After channeling for 1.25 seconds, casts a froze nova on a target, dealing 5000 magic damage to all nearby
Those affected will have 50% less movement speed and 25% less attack speed for 8 seconds

name: Frozen Soul
active: Summons 4 Frozen Souls after .5 seconds of channeling that last 90 seconds

name: Hellfrost Attack
Passive: On attack, applies debuff that rduces movement speed by 40% and attack speed by 20%

name: Frost Spike
active: After .75 seconds of channeling, shoots three spikes in a 30 degree arc that deals 7000 damage and stuns for .5 seconds

name: Frost Aura
passive: All enemies nearby will have -40% attack speed and -40% movement speed

name: Hellfrost Body
active: On auto-attack, 15% chance to deal 1.75x attack damage
passive: Deals 200 damage a second to all nearby enemies (1200 range)

name: Ice Storm
active: Chooses a target to be targeted by a blizzard. Spawns 20 waves at target location, dealing 8000 damage in total over 3 seconds

name: Web Binding
active: After .5 seconds of channeling, chooses a target to wrap up in webs
The web can be destroyed in 3 hits

name: Frozen Barrier
active: When cast, creates a shield that can absorb 10% HP that can be broken that lasts 10 seconds
When destroyed, freezes all enemies in place for 1 second

name: Frozen Shatter
active: Upon cast, pushes all enemies away. When a target is nearby, the caster will face toward that target for 3 seconds
before unleash a wave that will insta-kill all those in its path
If not target is selected, it will swipe where its face in a 150 degree arc, insta-killing everyone in the swipe

name: The Demon Lord's Power
passive: On auto-attack, 15% chance to deal 2.5x attack damage

name: Seal
active: On cast, silences and slows down target by 50% (attack and movement) for 7.5 seconds

name: Meteor
active: Chooses a target to spawn a firey infernal at location, dealing 4000 damage on impact

name: Destruction
active: On cast, deals 2000 damage to surrounding enemies (400 range)
On third cast, channels spell for 3 seconds before dealing 75% HP to all enemies (1000 range) and stuns self for 5 seconds

name: Catacylsm
active: On cast, summons a line going counter clockwise every 45 degree angle starting a 3-o-clock every second that kills all within its range

name: Rage
active: Gains 30% attack speed every second for 10 seconds

name: Permanent Immolation
passive: Deals 500 magic damage to all nearby enemies per second

name: Mad Howl
active: When activated, it places a purple circle on the ground
The circle will pulse once per second for 3 seconds and then pulse seven times for 2 seconds
Enemies on circle will be dealt 10% HP per pulse
If Mad Clown is on circle, he will heal 37,500 HP per pulse
On finish, if Mad Clown is not on circle, he will teleport to circle and face where he was
He will shoot three balls that deal 25% HP each toward where he was in a 30 degree arc

name: Mirror Image
active: Dispels all magic from the caster and creates two images that deal 20% damage and take 250% damage.

name: Wheel of Fate
active: Upon reaching half, Mad Clown will create a wheel that reaches 1000 range and can suck in anyone within 2000 range for 20 seconds
The wheel will have an inner and outer layer with 5 lines that move counter-clockwise
Every 5 seconds, lights will appear in either the inner or outer layer, if enemies are within that light after 1 second, they will be stunned for 10 seconds

name: Instincts
passive: On auto-attack, 20% chance to deal 1.75x attack damage

name: Spirit Breath
passive: On attack, give -5 armor debuff on enemy
Stacks 5 times

name: Rejuvination
active: Heals a target for 12500 over 12 seconds

name: Ethereal Strike
active: After choosing a target to follow, channels for 1.5 seconds and ignites the ground in a path toward the target in a wave
On impact, deals 25% HP damage
The flames last for 10 seconds dealing 900 damage per second

name: Spirit Echo
active: Creates a clone to cast Etheral Strike to a random target

name: Drain
active: Spawns eight green orbs around caster that slowly travels towards the caster
When orbs reach caster, they heal 1% HP each and give 5 mana, if they touch enemy, they deal 500 damage

name: Heaven's Wrath
passive: On reaching 50% HP, gain 25% damage reduction and changes spells
Etheral Strike now moves toward the target again when it reaches its length
Three thunder bolts now strike every second, dealing 1500 damage each and stunning enemies for 1 second
Dispels when healed to full

name: Corrupt Power
passive: On auto-attack, 40% chance to deal 1.5x attack damage

name: Corruption
active: On cast with .15 delay, chooses a random target to corrupt and deal 25% damage to all nearby enemies
On corruption, the enemy will spawn green circles every 2 seconds below which will deal a stackable 5% HP per second
Lasts for 20 seconds, circles remain on ground for 60 seconds

name: Death Coil
active: Chooses a target area that will explode for 20% HP and interrupt players after a 2 second delay
At 25% HP, after the initial blast, 8 coils will shoot out in diagonal and cardinal directions, dealing 1000 damage each and interrupting the first person they touch

name: Soul Swap
active: Binds two target's souls to be swapped. When their orbs each the other player, they will swap, insta-killing all nearby players on their locations

name: Corruption Overload
passive: Every 3 seconds second, Rectus will emit a blast of corruption that will deal increasing damage as the fight goes on

name: Corruption Aura
passive: Decreases nearby players armor by 25

name: Corrupted Summoning
passive: Every 25% missing, Rectus will summon his minions
At 75%, he'll summon 1 Avenger, Rectus is invulnerable until Avenger is killed
At 50%, he'll summon 1 Avenger and 8 Stalkers, Rectus is invulnerable until Avenger is killed
At 25%, he'll summon 1 Avenger and 8 Stalkers, Rectus will become vulnerable after 10 seconds

name: Corruption Wave
active: After 1 second wind-up, creates a 150 degree arc in front of the Avenger that deals 2500 magic damage and adds a -150 armor debuff on target that lasts 10 seconds

name: Corrupt Explosion
passive: On death, deals 10% HP to all nearby enemies. Heals Avenger for 10% if nearby

name: Purification
passive: On death, heals players 3000 HP per second for 15 seconds with a 20 second recharge
On 2nd death, deals 50% damage to nearby players every 5 seconds

name: Nightmare Body
passive: On auto-attack, 20% chance to deal 2x attack damage

name: Flame Barrage
active: Targets a random player and fires dual meteors every half second target the target location
Each impact stuns all enemies nearby for .5 seconds and deals 5000 damage each

name: Overload
passive: On auto-attack, drain all mana
On full mana and on next crowd control ability, pushes all players away for 5 seconds and becomes immune to crowd control effects

name: On Your Knees!
active: Targets a random player to jump toward, dealing 2000 damage on impact
Creates 8 lava spawns that walk toward the impact after spawning
Creates flame paths that deal 5% per second that last 3 seconds
On collision with the impact zone, heal Flame Nightmare for 10% if its near

name: Total Annihilation
passive: On trigger, become invulnerable and choose the closest player to target with Flame Barrage for ten seconds
Become vulnerable after duration is over

name: Berserk
active: Increases attack speed by 100%

name: Furious Attacks
passive: After the second strike on a target, stun for .1 second and deal 100% more damage on every attack
Disappears after losing target

name: Mark of Hatred
passive: Picks a nearby target to gaze at, marking them with a purple circle
After 10 seconds, fires a ball that will explode on contact, dealing 100% HP damage to all but the target

name: Chomp Armor
passive: On every attack, reduce armor of target by -5 for 3 seconds
Stacks until -50 armor

name: Mystic Shell
passive: Reduces enemy movement speed and attack speed by 20%

name: Hard Shell
passive: On Auto-attack, 15% chance to deal 2.5x attack damage

name: Turtle Ambush
passive: When reaching every 25% HP, gain 90% damage reduction and summons 8 Turtles
2 of these eight turtles will have 50% magic reduction
Lose damage reduction when all turtles are dead

name: Summon Heaing Turtle
passive: Summons a healing turtle from either end of the arena that walks toward Turtle Lord
Upon contact, heals Turtle Lord for 25% HP
Upon death, knocks back all enemies

name: Mana Bombardment
passive: Every second, sends a mana orb toward a random target
Deals 10% HP to everyone nearby impact zone
